page.title: 09The Old Post Office.
page.content: On Wednesday Class 2 went to visit the Old Post Office.We first saw some deeds and old photographs that had been given the owner Mr.Lambert.We went upstairs to see the bedrooms and Mr. Lambert showed us a cannon ball and a sword that he had found.We went into another bedroom where Mr. Lambert showed us the old beams and pegs that had lasted since the house had been first built. The Post Office is over 250 years old and was last used in 1983. Mr Lambert showed the cellar under the first floor.After this we had a glass of orange juice in the back garden.In the garden was an old pump with a handle that still worked.Mr.Lambert let us all have a go.After this we all said thank you to Mr.Lambert and went back to school.
